ProductInfo.Features:
Googo Camera is the first camera that can be connected with IOS and ANDROID smartphone and tablet without WIFI router
The USB Googo Camera is built in with 0.3 mega pixel CMOS camera and MIC to capture images, record video and audio directly at your smartphone and tablet device
And the Googo camera is the first camera that can be connect with your iOS and Android devices through WiFi functionality for peer to peer communication without need of any external network like WiFi router
The WiFi functionality allow you to covered a wide area of 100 meters, that is best for offices, at home while children are playing outside home or at lawn or many other purposes
The software provided with the Googo camera is completely safe for your device and is approved by the App store and Android market
ProductInfo.Name: (Can be connected with IOS and ANDROID smartphone and tablet without WIFI router)Googo Wifi Camera No need Router Wireless Portable Baby Monitor for IOS /Android
